General.Name: Barakah Offshore Petroleum Bhd
General.Description: Barakah Offshore Petroleum Berhad, an investment holding company, provides offshore and onshore pipeline services for oil and gas industry in Malaysia. It engages in pipeline/riser/submarine cable installation, transportation and installation of offshore structures, shore approach, and pipeline and structure repairing activities; and engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning (EPCC) of onshore gas transmission pipelines, mechanical and piping erection of onshore process plants, fabrication, shutdown maintenance, and EPCC of process facilities. The company also provides onshore pre-fabrication services for structural steel and process piping; offshore hook-up, tie ins, and commissioning of pre-fabricated structural steel, process piping, mechanical equipment, and electrical and instrument control systems for topside of offshore oil and gas production facilities; maintenance for offshore facilities; and blasting and painting works. In addition, it offers pre-commissioning, commissioning, and de-commissioning services for pipelines. Further, the company provides pipeline, structure, and topside, as well as preservation and abandonment de-commissioning services; and marine logistics, ship management, and chartering services. Additionally, it offers, including DPDSV services, subsea underwater services and maintenance, and underwater repair services, as well as inspection, maintenance, repair, drilling support, and related services for underwater facilities using main/support vessels, air and saturation diving systems, and remotely operated vehicles. The company provides water mining systems, pumping and jetting services, and boring and soil testing, as well as operates mineral processing and EPCC plant, maintains power plants, LNG storage, nitrogen generation plants, and wind vertical power turbines. Barakah Offshore Petroleum Berhad was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
